Data Science Initiative











Data Science Initiative at Brown




















Data Science Initiative at Brown
The mission of the Data Science Initiative (DSI) at Brown is to stimulate innovation and support people aspiring to improve lives in our data-driven world.










DSI engages people across campus and beyond, to: 

 
  
Educate all in data fluency and advanced area-specific applications of data science methods 
Stimulate large-scale multidisciplinary research developing and applying data science methods to multiple data modalities
Ensure that the power of data be leveraged toward a more equitable society










  Upcoming Events

News from DSI

Faculty Spotlight: Linda Clark





 April 7, 2023

  Linda Clark, newly promoted to Senior Lecturer of Data Science, has been the driving force behind DSI’s undergraduate education programs at Brown.


Read Article

















Open details for Faculty Spotlight: Linda Clark


























 News from Brown

Guardrails needed for responsible deployment of AI, Brown researcher tells Congress





March 8, 2023
  Speaking before a U.S. Senate committee on the risks and opportunities of artificial intelligence, computer scientist Suresh Venkatasubramanian urged lawmakers to establish regulations to govern AI-based systems.


Read Article

















Open details for Guardrails needed for responsible deployment of AI, Brown researcher tells Congress


























News from DSI

An Institute is Born





 February 15, 2023

  On Tuesday, February 7, the Brown faculty voted in favor of creating a Brown Data Science Institute, building on the Data Science Initiative that was created here in 2016.


Read Article

















Open details for An Institute is Born



















  Academic Programs














  Undergraduate Programs



  Data Science options for undergraduates include a Certificate in Data Fluency and the Data Science Fellows program trains undergraduates to collaborate with faculty to build more data science into course curricula. 




Certificate in Data Fluency














Data Science Fellows






























  Graduate Programs



  DSI offers a master's degree in Data Science and a doctoral certificate, designed for students from a broad range of educational and work backgrounds.




Master’s Program
